home.title: Aprica Mountain Lodge Holiday Homes
home.subtitle: 4 cozy apartments in the heart of Aprica
home.welcome: Welcome to your new mountain holiday homes
home.intro: Experience the true charm of the mountains without giving up comfort. Our brand-new holiday apartments, recently completed, are designed to offer relaxation, convenience and a warm, welcoming atmosphere all year round.
home.amenitiesTitle: Each apartment is fully equipped with modern amenities
home.description1: All spaces are new, stylish and carefully designed to make you feel at home, whether you're staying for a short break or a longer holiday.
home.description2: The location is perfect: close to the ski slopes, ideal for winter sports lovers, and within easy reach of all essential services such as shops, restaurants and public transport. In summer, enjoy nature, peace and a wide range of outdoor activities.
home.description3: A perfect blend of modern comfort and alpine charm awaits you. Your mountain getaway starts here.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How far are the ski lifts?
faq.a1: The ski lifts are just a 10-minute walk away (800 meters). The Aprica-Magnolta cable car is the closest one.
faq.a2: Yes, each apartment has a private covered and heated garage box.
faq.a3: We offer flexible check-in via keybox. We'll send you detailed instructions before arrival. Check-in from 3:00 PM, check-out by 10:00 AM.
faq.a4: Yes, all apartments feature a full kitchen with induction cooktop, dishwasher, refrigerator, and all necessary utensils.
faq.a5: Yes, free high-speed Wi-Fi in all apartments.
faq.a6: Pets are allowed by prior arrangement. Contact us for more information.

bernina.title: Bernina Express
bernina.description: The famous Bernina Red Train (UNESCO World Heritage) departs from Tirano, just 35 km from Aprica. An unforgettable experience through breathtaking alpine landscapes.

mortirolo.title: Mortirolo Pass
mortirolo.description: One of the most iconic climbs in world cycling. Perfect for bike enthusiasts in summer, and for scenic walks in winter.

piste.title: Aprica Ski Resort
piste.description: 50 km of perfectly groomed slopes, featuring the famous Baradello run and connection to Corteno Golgi. Modern lifts and ski school.
